text: Ej mu'minon ʙa jahudijon va nasronijon ʙigued: «Mo ʙa Alloh va ojote, ki ʙar mo nozil suda va niz on ci ʙar Iʙrohimu Ismoil va Ishoqu Ja'quʙ va naʙeragonas nozil suda va niz on ci ʙa Muso va Iso firistoda suda va on ci ʙar pajomʙaroni digar az coniʙi Parvardigorason omadaast, imon ovardem. Mijoni hec jak az pajomʙaron farqe namenihem va hama dar ʙaroʙari Alloh ʙo to'atu iʙodat taslim hastem»
